title: Area of region from the graph of the derivative

content.prompt: The graph of the function f shown above consists of two line segments. If g is the function defined by g( x )= ∫ 0 x f ( t )dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4460@ , then g( −1 )= MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B56@
